title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for building the ‘client-side’ of our web applications.
qualifications: Proven work experience as a Frontend Developer

title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Seeking a Full Stack Engineer to design, develop and maintain our web applications. The ideal candidate is proficient in both frontend and backend development.
qualifications: Proficient in a frontend framework like Vue, React, or Angular

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We're hiring a talented UI/UX Designer to create amazing user experiences. The ideal candidate should have an eye for clean and artful design.
qualifications: Proficiency in design software (e.g., Figma, Sketch)

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Join our team as a DevOps Engineer to manage our infrastructure and streamline our deployment processes.
qualifications: Knowledge of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
